most_active_tickets.title: Cannot connect to Authentication site during install of Pieces
Failed sharing my snippets using a link or GitHub gist.

common_issues.title: Pieces connection and sharing failures on Windows
common_issues.description: Users on Windows are experiencing issues connecting to Pieces during installation, particularly within VDI environments with security software like Cortex XDR.  Sharing snippets via links or GitHub gists is also failing.  Check network connectivity, firewall settings, and Pieces version compatibility. Consider temporary disabling security software for testing purposes.

related_issues.title: Cannot connect to Authentication site during install of Pieces
related_issues.text:
Cannot connect to Authentication site during install of Pieces
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I end up at this url:

https://pieces.app/authentication-error?sentry_id=00000000000000000000000000000000&os=917d9227-e6ca-45d6-ae1a-c6b76b70a5c1&platform=windows

Please note:  This is when I install Pieces as part of the UltraEdit 2025.0 install on my work VDI.
Our VDIs have Cortex XDR for security so this may be blocking it.  If so, I probably can't use Pieces at work.  I highly doubt they will open any ports for this.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Failed sharing my snippets using a link or GitHub gist.
related_issues.text: Failed sharing my snippets using a link or GitHub gist. ### Checked for Existing Issues? - [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this. ### Software Desktop Application ### Operating System / Platform Windows ### Your Pieces OS Version 12.1.1 ### Early Access Program - [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature. ### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug. When trying to share my code snippets using a link or through GitHub gi st, it fails. Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Prioritize resolving Windows connectivity issues during Pieces installation, especially within VDI environments with security software like Cortex XDR.
Investigate and address the root cause of sharing failures via links and GitHub gists on Windows.
Improve documentation and communication regarding network connectivity, firewall settings, and Pieces version compatibility for Windows users.
Consider providing temporary workarounds or solutions for users affected by security software conflicts.
Monitor and analyze support tickets for emerging trends and patterns to proactively address potential issues.
